member.name: T:LINQ.Controllers.BuyersController
member.summary: Represents methods to work with the table of the buyers.

member.name: M:LINQ.Controllers.BuyersController.MakeSerializationAndDeserialization(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Serialize buyer table into the file by passed path and deserialize buyer table from the file by passed path. Use command s to serialize and d to deserialize.

member.name: M:LINQ.Controllers.BuyersController.Get
member.summary: Get the list of buyers.

member.name: M:LINQ.Controllers.BuyersController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the buyer by passed id.

member.name: M:LINQ.Controllers.BuyersController.Post(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a new buyer.

member.name: T:LINQ.Controllers.DataBaseController

member.summary: Get the results of the linq-methods.
